description: The slug of the service portal kapp to use for the momentum portal. If omitted, will default to "service-portal".
name: Service Portal Kapp Slug

description: The slug of the system kapp to use for the momentum portal. If omitted, will default to "system".
name: System Kapp Slug

description: The configuration for custom theming of the portal. Do not edit this value manually.
name: Theme
